mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_SIGN (REPORT_ID, MEMBER_ID, RE_SIGN, RE_READ, REPORT_SIGN_COUNTER) VALUES (#{ reportId }, #{ memberId }, 'Y', 'N', #{ reportSignCounter })
mapper.select: select * from REPORT_SIGN where REPORT_ID = #{ reportId } and REPORT_SIGN_COUNTER != 0 order by REPORT_SIGN_COUNTER
